content.description: Big holds lead through the bulge in the white rock. Follow amazing big holds above.
content.protection: 10 bolts to a 2-bolt anchor with chains.
content.location: From Sun Tan Ledge, climb up through the white rock.

content.description: This has a hard move climbing through a bulge at about the 4th bolt above a ledge.
content.protection:
8 bolts to an anchor shared with

Harvey

.
content.location: This is above the left side anchor. Move the belay from Sun Tan Ledge to this anchor.

content.description: Head up to a pillar that allows passage through the roof area. Incredible in-cut holds appear then disappear. This is a fine line.
content.protection: 8/9 bolts to a 2-bolt anchor with chains.
content.location: Begin from the left side of Sun Tan Ledge.

content.description: The Leopard has a hard move in the rotten band. There are interesting moves above.
content.protection: 7 bolts to a 2-bolt anchor with chains.
content.location: Climb the 3rd dihedral from the left side.

content.description:
Climb through the roof between

Lion King

and

Call Me Bwana

. All these routes have incredible holds at the roof then momentary difficulty getting your body over.
content.protection:
8 bolts to a shared anchor with

Lion King

.
content.location:
From Sun Tan Ledge, follow the bolts between

Lion King

&

Call Me Bwana

.

content.description: Follow the leftmost of the 4 dihedrals on the left side of the Big Five. This climbs excellent rock to big holds at the overhang near the top.
content.protection: 7 bolts to a 2-bolt anchor with chains.
content.location: This is above and slightly left of the left side anchor. Move the belay from Sun Tan Ledge to this anchor.

content.description: Dumbo has easy climbing on big holds.
content.protection: 5 bolts to a 2-bolt anchor with chains.
content.location: This is the leftmost route. Begin on a ledge behind the pine tree farthest left in the picture.

content.description: This has several interesting crux moves through bulges. It has big holds where needed.
content.protection:
9 bolts to an anchor shared with

White Rhino

.
content.location:
From Sun Tan Ledge, this is the rightmost route. It is just right of

White Rhino

.

content.description: Find big holds at the roof, then solve the crux puzzle. Easier but fun climbing leads to the anchors.
content.protection: 8 or 9 bolts to 2-bolt Fixe ring anchors.
content.location: From Sun Tan Ledge, aim for the first bolt near the small pine tree below the roof.

content.description: This has a boulder problem crux getting off the ledge at the rotten band. There is another crux higher until gargantuan holds are encountered.
content.protection:
8 bolts to a shared anchor with

The Leopard

.
content.location: This climbs the 4th dihedral from the left side. Move belay from Sun Tan Ledge to the left side anchor.
